channel.title: How do I move the Wise Old Man? Read here! Reward!
channel.description: Im trying to make a new home and I want to keep the Wise Old Man and Make Over Mage and stuff but I cant find their coords to move them to my new home area... Any help? Will reward! This is a PI Source.

item.title: How do I move the Wise Old Man? Read here! Reward!
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

Spawn Config, Find there NPC number and then the numbers on the right are the coords, you can change it.(:

OtherWise- My Prizeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee XD

Read full topic
